column1: # HiSPARC data is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.
# This data contains the following columns:
# timestamp: time the layout was measured in seconds after 1970-1-1 [UNIX timestamp]
#     radius: distance to detector from GPS
#     alpha: angle between detector and true north as seen from GPS [degrees]
#     height: altitude of the detector above plane of GPS [meters]
#     beta: angle of the long side of the scintillator to true north [degrees]

{% for layout in layouts %}{{ layout.timestamp }}	{{ layout.detector_1_radius }}	{{ layout.detector_1_alpha }}	{{ layout.detector_1_height }}	{{ layout.detector_1_beta }}	{{ layout.detector_2_radius }}	{{ layout.detector_2_alpha }}	{{ layout.detector_2_height }}	{{ layout.detector_2_beta }}	{{ layout.detector_3_radius }}	{{ layout.detector_3_alpha }}	{{ layout.detector_3_height }}	{{ layout.detector_3_beta }}	{{ layout.detector_4_radius }}	{{ layout.detector_4_alpha }}	{{ layout.detector_4_height }}	{{ layout.detector_4_beta }}
